title: Chao Zhineng Zuqiu 2: Shijie Dasai Pian
title_japanese: 超智能足球2:世界大赛篇
synopsis: Super Smart Football 2-World Series" is a teenage inspirational animation produced and distributed by Shenzhen Cube Animation Culture Development Co., Ltd. that combines "football competition", "future technology" and "humor and fun". In the 21st century, sports and technology are closely related. Sporting goods need the cooperation of science and technology. When designing footballs and football shoes, precise data and computer tests are needed to make some sporting goods that can exert human limits. If it is tested by humans, the state and technology must be deviated and unstable, so Dr. GGO was hired to assist in product development, and the GGO mechanical football player was born. With the rapid development of science and technology, the football competition has entered the unprecedented AI era-the football robot GGO, which is the size of a palm but has cutting-edge AI intelligence, was born! Fans all over the world are flocking! They have established their own GGO football teams and vowed to show their leading talents! The 13-year-old story protagonist Gao Xun accidentally got the unique seventh-generation GGO Qianlong invented by the father of a GGO expert, so he formed a "barefoot team" with his comrades to participate in the world GGO competition, and compete with other powers around the world. GGO football battle! At the same time, he secretly carried the hope of his father and led Qianlong to the finals to solve a little-known big conspiracy... (translated from iqiyi)
